name: Ancient Atonement
description:
Description

Delve into an Ancient Dungeon as Matthew Moore, a tenacious and adventurous Egyptologist. Matthew, in his search to enrich himself through finding and selling Ancient Egyptian artifacts, finds himself cursed and trapped in the blighted underground of a temple formerly devoted to the worship of Anubis. Now, the temple and its dungeons are corrupted by a dark and malevolent force. It is up to you, as Matthew Moore, to explore these ancient tunnels and free yourself from your curse.

Features

- Main Quest

- Dialogue and Story

- Four Side Quests / Achievements

- Multiple Endings

- Breakable Barrels!

Replayability

Ancient Atonement can be replayed multiple times, each time being a different experience. The game offers multiple different side quests, which unlock achievements on the main menu. 

Game Jam

Ancient Atonement was developed during the "Brynation 1st Annual Christmas Game Jam" under the theme "Everything Has a Price".
